name: llama2.ts
description: Llama2 inference in one TypeScript file

scripts.demo-node: node --experimental-loader=./t348.mjs llama2.ts stories15M.bin -i "Once upon a time"
scripts.demo-bun: node --experimental-loader=./t348.mjs llama2.ts stories15M.bin -i "Once upon a time"
scripts.deterministic: node --experimental-loader=./t348.mjs llama2.ts stories15M.bin -s 1 -t 0 -i "Once upon a time"

author: wizzard0
